allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update TODO.md: Mark Phase 1 complete \(25/25\)

- Updated progress tracker to show Phase 1 Foundation complete
- Added progress notes documenting work from 2026-01-24 to 2026-01-31
- Added technical decisions made section

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Step 2.1.1: Redux Store Configuration

- Created Redux store with configureStore and placeholder reducer
- Added typed hooks \(useAppDispatch, useAppSelector\) for type-safe Redux access
- Updated main.tsx to wrap App with Redux Provider
- Created comprehensive test utilities with renderWithProviders
- Added 67 new tests \(21 store + 17 hooks + 29 test-utils\)
- Fixed TypeScript issues in tasks.service.ts and task.types.ts
- Updated TODO.md with progress \(31/225 tasks complete\)
- Total tests: 270 passing

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Step 2.2.1: Task Slice - Basic State Management

Implement comprehensive Redux slice for task state management:

Features:
- Normalized state with tasks indexed by ID
- Date-based indexing \(taskIdsByDate\) for efficient queries
- All CRUD reducers with proper date index management
- 12 selectors for querying task state
- SyncStatus tracking for offline support

Reducers:
- setTasks: Load tasks for a specific date
- addTask: Add new task with date index update
- updateTask: Update task, handle date changes
- removeTask: Remove task and clean up indexes
- setSelectedDate, setLoading, setError, setSyncStatus
- clearTasks, reorderTasksLocal, batchUpdateTasks

Selectors:
- selectAllTasks, selectTaskById, selectTasksByDate
- selectTasksForSelectedDate, selectSelectedDate
- selectTasksLoading, selectTasksError, selectTasksSyncStatus
- selectTasksByPriorityForDate, selectTaskCountForDate
- selectCompletedTaskCountForDate, selectTasksLoadedForDate

Tests: 55 new tests for slice, 325 total tests passing
Updated README with project status and documentation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: Update TODO.md with accurate progress tracking

- Update Phase 1 progress: All 25 tasks complete \(1.3 Firebase, 1.4 Auth\)
- Update Phase 2 progress: 6/18 tasks complete \(2.1.1 Redux Store\)
- Add Last Updated date field
- Add progress notes for 2026-01-30 and 2026-01-31
- Total: 31/225 tasks complete, 325 tests passing

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Step 2.2.2: Task Async Thunks

Implement async thunks for task CRUD operations:
- fetchTasksByDate: Fetch tasks for a specific date
- createTask: Create new task in Firestore
- updateTaskAsync: Update existing task
- deleteTask: Soft delete task
- hardDeleteTask: Permanently delete task
- restoreTask: Restore soft-deleted task
- batchUpdateTasksAsync: Batch update multiple tasks
- fetchTasksByDateRange: Fetch tasks for date range

Added extraReducers to taskSlice for all thunk states.
Comprehensive test coverage with 33 thunk tests.
Total: 88 task tests passing.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Step 2.3.1: Category Slice - Complete Data Layer

Implement complete category management system:

Categories Service \(src/services/firebase/categories.service.ts\):
- createCategory: Create new category in Firestore
- getCategory: Fetch single category by ID
- getCategories: Fetch all categories for user \(sorted\)
- updateCategory: Update category fields
- deleteCategory: Permanently delete category
- getCategoryCount: Get user''s category count
- categoryNameExists: Check for duplicate names

Category Slice \(src/features/categories/categorySlice.ts\):
- Normalized state with categories map and sorted IDs
- Reducers: setCategories, addCategory, updateCategory, removeCategory
- State management: loading, error, syncStatus, initialized
- Comprehensive selectors for all use cases

Category Thunks \(src/features/categories/categoryThunks.ts\):
- fetchCategories: Load all user categories
- createCategory: Create with duplicate name check
- updateCategoryAsync: Update with duplicate name check
- deleteCategory: Remove from Firestore and state
- checkCategoryNameExists: Utility for form validation

Store Integration:
- Added categoryReducer to root reducer
- Configured serializableCheck for categories

Test Coverage \(76 new tests\):
- 20 service tests
- 32 slice tests
- 24 thunk tests

Phase 2 \(Data Layer\) is now complete!
Total: 434 tests passing

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Step 3.1.1: Task List Component - Basic Rendering

Implements the core task list UI components with comprehensive testing:

Components:
- TaskItem: Displays individual task with priority label, status symbol,
  title, category color indicator, and recurrence icon
- TaskPriorityGroup: Groups tasks by priority letter \(A/B/C/D\) with
  color-coded headers and task counts
- TaskList: Main component that groups tasks by priority, handles
  empty/loading states, and renders priority groups

Utilities \(src/utils/taskUtils.ts\):
- groupTasksByPriority: Groups and sorts tasks by priority letter
- sortTasksByPriority: Sorts tasks by letter then number
- getStatusSymbol/getPriorityColor/getStatusColor: Display helpers
- formatPriorityLabel: Formats "A1", "B2", etc.
- isTaskComplete/isTaskDeleted/isTaskRecurring: State checks
- countTasksByStatus/getCompletionPercentage: Aggregation functions

Features:
- Franklin-Covey A-B-C-D priority color coding
- Status symbols: ● \(in_progress\), ➜ \(forward\), ✔ \(complete\),
  ✘ \(delete\), ◯ \(delegate\)
- Category color indicators
- Recurrence icon \(↻\) for recurring tasks
- Completed task styling \(strikethrough, opacity\)
- Full accessibility support \(ARIA labels, keyboard navigation\)
- Empty state with helpful message
- Loading state with spinner

Tests: 132 new tests \(566 total\)
- 43 taskUtils tests
- 38 TaskItem tests
- 25 TaskPriorityGroup tests
- 26 TaskList tests

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Step 3.1.2: Task List Integration with Redux

- Create TaskListContainer component connecting TaskList to Redux store
- Implement useTasksByDate and useSelectedDateTasks hooks
- Create mock data utilities \(createMockTask, createMockCategory, etc.\)
- Add statusUtils with getNextStatus for status cycling
- Update component tests to use correct Task type structure
- 670 tests passing

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
